text: @realDonaldTrump Then why did you and @PressSec do it, ELEVEN TIMES? #Deflection 20 Million unemployment claims, OVER 100,000 American DEAD from #COVID19  die to your inept, lack of leadership and narcissism. @WhiteHouse vote @JoeBiden
